channel.title: Help With Game (JavaScript)
channel.description:
I do not intend to break any rules by posting this in this section of the forums. This has nothing to do with RSPS regardless of what people say.
I wanted to ask for some help.. I recently visited a site and downloaded one of their products call Unity3D. Unity3D is excellent and can create all sorts of games. But let me get to my point here, i was on unity creating games and decided to build a mmorpg. I did my best and im still working on it but a question came to my mind. How will people play my game and i did some stuff but i have one bad problem. I need to learn how to set up a database that will allow me to save the players information when they log off and send it back when they want to log in...
So i came here to ask, If someone would make a tutorial on how to set up a database for this situation and how to make a loginbox for them to load their character.
It would be great if someone had a free way to do this because i am already spending a large budget.

item.title: Help With Game (JavaScript)
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:2, topic:344219”]Why not try the Unity3D Forums??

Surely they would know more about it than us[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

Good luck building your mmorpg game out of “JavaScript”
Reading this, I don’t think your quite ready yet…

Read full topic

item.description:
@John459 wrote:

For the database just use mysql. It’s pretty damn simple.

Read full topic

I do not intend to break any rules by posting this in this section of the forums.
This has nothing to do with RSPS regardless of what people say.

I wanted to ask for some help… I recently visited a site and downloaded one of their products call Unity3D. Unity3D is excellent and can create all sorts of games. I need to learn how to set up a database that will allow me to save the players information when they log off and send it back when they want to log in…

So i came here to ask, If someone would make a tutorial on how to set up a database for this situation and how to make a loginbox for them to load their character.
